attributes.action: To Make All Forms Of Nudity In Public Places Illegal
attributes.additional_details: Because such activities are clearly a breach of common decency behaviours and standards
attributes.background: To make it illegal to be naked in a public place for any reason such as naked bike riding

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641882
